Presentation.paragraph: Fullstack Developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina. Passionate about software development and specialized in web development. Expert in modern technologies and creating efficient, scalable applications.

FirstExperience.name: La barra boulevard
FirstExperience.title: Full-stack developer
FirstExperience.description: On this occasion, I was able to implement my technical knowledge for the company I previously worked for, developing and designing a full-stack e-commerce web application with its respective database.

SecondExperience.name: La barra boulevard
SecondExperience.title: Kitchen assistant
SecondExperience.description: As a kitchen assistant, I played a crucial role in the production of tasks in a high-demand environment.

ThirdExperience.name: La barra boulevard
ThirdExperience.title: Waiter
ThirdExperience.description: In this position, I had the opportunity to perform customer service tasks, which allowed me to develop multiple communication skills.

FirstFormation.name: Ezeiza University
FirstFormation.title: Software Development Technician
FirstFormation.description: Currently in this program, I am training as a software developer, learning and reinforcing good practices and general programming concepts.

project1.title: La Barra Boulevard
project1.description: La Barra Boulevard is currently my most important project. It is a full-stack e-commerce developed for a restaurant in Chile, featuring very intuitive navigation and robust database management.

project2.title: Vorttex Gaming
project2.description: Vorttex Gaming is an e-commerce that we developed with my study team. I faced some challenges that, once overcome, helped me improve as a developer.

project3.title: YourHiring
project3.description: YourHiring is a job application management platform that allows each user to personalize and optimize their job search.

project4.title: Pokedex
project4.description: Pokedex built with the Poke-Api, featuring registration forms, login, and Pokémon creation. It also includes sorting, filtering, and searching for Pokémon.

Contact.text: Take your project to the next level
